titleStmt.title: The bucolicks of Baptist Mantuan in ten eclogues. / Translated out of Latine into English, by Tho: Harvey Gent.
Adulescentia. English
titleStmt.author: Baptista, Mantuanus, 1448-1516.
Harvey, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Humphrey Moseley, and are to be sold at his shop at the Princes Armes in S. Pauls Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "3 Nouemb. 1655."; the second 6 in the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the Princes Armes in S. Pauls Church-yard.
